title: Wagner Park, a Haven in Lower Manhattan, Could Soon Be Demolished
description: A resiliency plan would tear down Wagner Park in Lower Manhattan and rebuild it on higher ground, but some residents say it goes too far.
dc:creator: Winnie Hu and Anne Barnard
category: Wagner, Robert F Jr, Park (Manhattan, NY)
media:credit: Ahmed Gaber for The New York Times
media:description: A resiliency plan would demolish Wagner Park and rebuild it 10 feet higher, at roughly 20 feet above sea level.
